languages.text: {n}В устах Арлекина "Извечной шутки смех" прозвучало почтительно, словно титул или звание. Вам вспомнилось, что Арлекины служат Смеющемуся богу Цегораху. Судя по всему, ксенос говорит о том, что спасти провидцев он пытается по его воле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В устах Арлекина "Извечной шутки смех" прозвучало почтительно, словно титул или звание. Вам вспомнилось, что Арлекины служат Смеющемуся богу Цегораху. Судя по всему, ксенос говорит о том, что спасти провидцев он пытается по его воле.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В устах Арлекина "Извечной шутки смех" прозвучало почтительно, словно титул или звание. Вам вспомнилось, что Арлекины служат Смеющемуся богу Цегораху. Судя по всему, ксенос говорит о том, что спасти провидцев он пытается по его воле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

{n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

{n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

{n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}丑角在说出“纵情大笑”这几个字时充满了敬意，仿佛这句话指代的是某个称号或某个存在。你回忆起来，丑角侍奉的是笑神乔高奇。这个异形的意思应该是说，他是在乔高奇的授意之下，试着前来拯救这个先知的生命。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角在说出“纵情大笑”这几个字时充满了敬意，仿佛这句话指代的是某个称号或某个存在。你回忆起来，丑角侍奉的是笑神乔高奇。这个异形的意思应该是说，他是在乔高奇的授意之下，试着前来拯救这个先知的生命。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín pronunció las palabras «risa de bromas sin fin» con reverencia, como si fuera un título o una posición. Recuerdas que los Arlequines sirven a Cegorach, el dios que ríe. Parece que el xenos está diciendo que intenta salvar a los videntes bajo órdenes de Cegorach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín pronunció las palabras «risa de bromas sin fin» con reverencia, como si fuera un título o una posición. Recuerdas que los Arlequines sirven a Cegorach, el dios que ríe. Parece que el xenos está diciendo que intenta salvar a los videntes bajo órdenes de Cegorach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは「終わりなき戯れの笑い」という言葉を、まるで称号か地位のように敬意を払って言った。ハーレクィンが笑う神セゴラックに仕えていることを思い出した。この異種族は、先見司たちを救おうとしているのはセゴラックの命令だと言っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは「終わりなき戯れの笑い」という言葉を、まるで称号か地位のように敬意を払って言った。ハーレクィンが笑う神セゴラックに仕えていることを思い出した。この異種族は、先見司たちを救おうとしているのはセゴラックの命令だと言っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin hat die Worte "ew'gen Scherzes Lachen" mit Ehrerbietung gesprochen, als sei es ein Titel oder Rang. Du erinnerst dich daran, dass Harlekine dem Lachenden Gott Cegorach dienen. Der Xenos sagt offenbar, dass er auf Cegorachs Geheiß hin versucht, die Runenpropheten zu retten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin hat die Worte "ew'gen Scherzes Lachen" mit Ehrerbietung gesprochen, als sei es ein Titel oder Rang. Du erinnerst dich daran, dass Harlekine dem Lachenden Gott Cegorach dienen. Der Xenos sagt offenbar, dass er auf Cegorachs Geheiß hin versucht, die Runenpropheten zu retten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin a prononcé les mots "rire éternel" avec révérence, comme s'il s'agissait d'un titre ou d'un rang. Il vous revient en mémoire que les Arlequins servent Cegorach, le Dieu Moqueur. Le xénos semble donc indiquer qu'il tente de sauver les Grands Prophètes à la demande de cet être supérieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin a prononcé les mots "rire éternel" avec révérence, comme s'il s'agissait d'un titre ou d'un rang. Il vous revient en mémoire que les arlequins servent Cegorach, le Dieu Moqueur. Le xénos semble donc indiquer qu'il tente de sauver les Grands Prophètes à la demande de cet être supérieur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Sonu gelmez cümbüşün kahkahası" derken Arleken'in sesi, birisinin ünvanını anıyormuşçasına hürmet dolu çıkıyor. Arlekenlerin, Gülen Tanrı Cegorach'a hizmet ettiğini anımsıyorsun. Görünen o ki bu zeno, Ötesezenleri Cegorach istediği için kurtarmaya çalıştığını anlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin said the words "laugh of jest unending" with reverence, as if it were a title or rank. You recall that Harlequins serve the Laughing God Cegorach. It seems the xenos is saying that it is at Cegorach's behest that he is attempting to save the Farseers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Sonu gelmez cümbüşün kahkahası" derken Arleken'in sesi, birisinin ünvanını anıyormuşçasına hürmet doluydu. Arlekenlerin, Gülen Tanrı Cegorach'a hizmet ettiğini anımsıyorsun. Görünen o ki bu zeno, Ötesezenleri Cegorach istediği için kurtarmaya çalıştığını anlatıyor.{/n}
